module.name: Trunk Balance
module.changelog: *1.1.0* Additional flexibility for billing periods *1.0.2* pass dialed number directly to dialout macro *1.0.1* fixed max unique call logic *1.0.0* revised to work with FreePBX 2.10 *0.0.4.3* Allow balance of DAHDI trunks and move to Github *0.0.4.2* bug fix *0.0.4.1* added timeconditions module dependency *0.0.4* added time condition *0.0.3.3* bug fix *0.0.3.2* bug fix *0.0.3* freePBX 2.6 dependency *0.0.2* display bug with Freepbx 2.5; improved uninstall. *0.0.1* alpha release
module.description: Allows user to balance/limit outbound calls between different trunks
